column4: Howmuch % overhead does the ext3 filesystem normally has? thats to say, if I start with a 100GiB drive, howmany GiB will be left?
it's not a big overhead, I would say, you have 99 GiB.
so it would be like 99% - 5% reserved?
I don't really know. But is not noticeable really. It just a few megs.
